title: Meal log
description: Each entry records the state of new, ongoing, or recently completed project.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of data entry.

start_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of data entry.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of data entry.
HH:MM:SS formatted time of data entry.

person_id.description: the person who led the project.

was successful.description: indicates whether the project was successful
